name: redux-mock-store
description: A mock store for testing your redux async action creators and middleware

scripts.prepublish: rimraf lib && rimraf dist && npm run build
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -f umd -c -i src/index.js -o dist/index-umd.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -f umd -c -i src/index.js -o dist/index-umd.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -f es -c -i src/index.js -o dist/index-es.js
scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:es

author: Arnaud Benard <arnaudm.benard@gmail.com>
